Name: Freedom Farmers Market
Season: June-November; close first sat before thanksgiving; begin a CSA program during the off months
Special features: considering a relocation -- been challenged by sits in parking lot back from the street (hard to see) move closer to bart WILL CONFIRM NEXT WEEK;
Notes:
Their mission is to bring traditional legacy foods from Black farmers and other Under-represented farmers to the Bay Area with the goal of making regionally Non GMO, fresh organic or pesticide 
free produce and nutritional information accessible in areas devoid of supermarkets. http://www.farmstogrow.com/freedomfarmersmarket
